title: Deadline for RGSoC
body_html: A new feature can be added to the RGSoC TeamsApp wherein the time left/deadline for the application process of RGSoC to end can be shown, so as to remind the participants whenever they access the site. Also, other information like dates for declaration of results can be incorporated.
body_text: A new feature can be added to the RGSoC TeamsApp wherein the time left/deadline for the application process of RGSoC to end can be shown, so as to remind the participants whenever they access the site. Also, other information like dates for declaration of results can be incorporated.
